name: _MEM.RECALL();
description:
This future is war. Go back in time to fix it all.

A platformer for Open Jam 2019.

Lore

It's the future. Everyone's fighting over the mysterious time machine, hidden in the depths of your father's underground laboratory. Your goal is to go back in time and prevent him from building this disastrous piece of technology.

Controls
  • Left/right - movement
  • Up - jump
  • X - flip
  • Z - dash
